name: ctrl + alt + delete
description:
Online Viruses have invaded the computer. It is up to the combined forces of 'ctrl' and 'alt' to delete all viruses on the computer before it is corrupted beyond repair.

Move both 'ctrl' and 'alt'. When they both meet, all Viruses on the Computer will be deleted. Use A,W,D to move 'ctrl' and the arrow keys to move 'alt'.

Additionally, both 'ctrl' and 'alt' have special abilities. 'ctrl' can copy and paste certain object while 'alt' can jump between different tabs.
